javax.ws.rs.client

Class Entity<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.ws.rs.client.Entity<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - entity type.

    public final class Entity<T>
extends Object
    Encapsulates message entity including the associated variant information.
    Author:
    Marek Potociar
